introZh: 研究低光、雾霾与极端天气下的自适应增强模型，并结合大规模超分重建框架，在抑制噪声的同时放大关键细节，全面提升真实场景中的成像质量。
introEn: Develop adaptive enhancement models for low-light, haze, and adverse-weather imagery, coupling them with large-scale super-resolution frameworks to preserve fine details and boost real-world imaging quality.

introZh: 聚焦去反射、去阴影、去雨/去雪等任务，构建端到端恢复框架与工具箱（如 XReflection），覆盖数据构建、训练到推理的全流程，保障真实应用的稳定输出。
introEn: Build end-to-end restoration frameworks and toolkits (e.g., XReflection) for reflection, shadow, and rain removal, spanning data curation, training pipelines, and deployment-ready inference to ensure stable real-world output.

introZh: 面向跨域目标检测与语义分割，探索鲁棒特征对齐、时空特征聚合与轻量化推理策略，支撑城市与工业场景的实时智能感知。
introEn: Tackle cross-domain detection and semantic segmentation via robust feature alignment, spatiotemporal aggregation, and lightweight inference to empower real-time perception in urban and industrial settings.
